name: real-estate-photo-minimap
description: Generate a minimap browser for real estate photos

scripts.build: rm -r dist && NODE_ENV=production parcel build --no-source-maps browser/index.pug
scripts.test: npm run precheck && NODE_ENV=test echo "No tests" 1>&2 && npm run lint

author: Todd Wolfson <todd@twolfson.com> (http://twolfson.com/)
